articles.description: Irish star Evanna Lynch, who played Luna Lovegood in the Harry Potter films, secretly dated a co-star for nine-years.  After meeting on the set of the fifth film, Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix, Lynch hit it off with a fellow wizard. Their romance …
